document.discussion_title: Rio 2016 Olympics Ends With Splendid Ceremony,Handover To Tokyo
document.topic_text: BRASILIA (dpa-AFX) - The Rio Olympics 2016 ended with a spectacular carnival-inspired closing ceremony , and the official handover to 2020 hosts Tokyo.The colourful ceremony, lasting almost three h... »
